message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! I'm thinking of selling it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for it right now.
I understand that $180 is a bit high for you, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $160. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product!
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $160 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to go up to $145, which is a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $155. It's still a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product!
